name: red_rooster
text: Don Me!

name: lolsworth
text: Who, with David Me, formed the band Me (Not Me).

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by unquotable, EndOfTheWorld, SotiCoto)

name: peterjoel
text: I think this is the first comment that I've seen from asherdan with 0 lames. I didn't think I'd see it ever!

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, patkun, divot, madnes, Erutangis, StoatLad, NeoNaoNeo, Devin, hectik, goocifer, cmjhogan, wurlitzergirl, StagnantDisplay, svenkta, NDCaesar, Sweetlips, regrepsnefpoh, anewcede, Zem, bixschmix, achilleselbow, jonnylatron, Cowey42, Doc_Rostov, hausea, holly_golightly, mastema23, Madoushi, Panserbjorne, _PINK)

text:
you are consciously trying to be more annoying than asherdan

i hope

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Erutangis, EM2, Feralig8tr, NDCaesar, Sweetlips, anewcede, jonnylatron, Panserbjorne, foea, tellumo, _PINK)

name: chrissketch
text: Oh man, with the repeating stripes covering the shirt like one of those all-over bleed prints, the Ray graphic in the lower left corner all disobeying the standard format of t-shirt design.

name: katal
text: I know I recognize the last panel from a movie. From something. I just can't put my finger on it.

name: closefriend
text: It looks like "High Anxiety."

name: yaegmenthor
text: Vertigo?

name: bixschmix
text: Yeah, I was thinking Vertigo too.

name: killingthejay
text: I HAVE THE POWERRRRR!!!

name: rowboat
text: Ben Hur

name: bozendoka
text: Exactly what I thought of!

name: fattypneumonia
text: Opening from "The Altered State of Druggachusetts."

name: craigola
text: Ray gets all the frikkin' breaks!

name: mortshire
text: i am totally hearing that sound from the six million dollar man in that last panel, all CHHH CHH SHH SH SH WHH WHHH.

name: iseedeadpixels
text: EXACTLY! A chubby for you Mr. Mortshire

name: rowboat
text:
You two are definitely showing your age here.

Wait...what?

name: rocket6240
text: This is one of my favorites. The psychadelic transformation is amazing.

name: buttermoths
text: Yes, the way he transforms into Ray With A Shoe.

name: tinhand
text:
That last panel gets this strip a five. It would be awesome just by itself. Seriously, you can almost imagine a 'He-man and the masters of the universe' moment, all "I...HAVE...THE POWER!!"
And yes, a T with that panel on it would be cool. I'd probably buy one.

name: heyman
text: It's the eyebrows that do it

name: rowboat
text: It's the stormtrooper that does it. With the air.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: repeatedly .

name: capslock_annliv
text: biblically.

name: tomsmith
text: That last panel would work really well as a Magic Tree style car air freshener.

name: drycup
text:
I wish I could pose and concentric outlines of me would spontaniously form.

Sigh.

name: dasilodavi
text: That shoe could be the formal wear of Venom.

name: snowman
text: I...what?

name: dasilodavi
text:
The alien symbiote from the Spider-man universe.

Or if it helps, swap-swip that shit...

"That shoe could be the Venom of formal wear."
There ya go!

name: stubob
text: I totally thought of the metal band Venom first. Does that make me more or less dorky?

name: tekende
text: It depends. Do you wear stupid collared shirts with awful patterns and shorts? Possibly boots?

name: rowboat
text: More. I'm sorry.

name: stubob
text: How could an appreciation of early black metal be anything less than cool?

name: rowboat
text: More dorky doesn't equal less cool.

name: stubob
text: Ah. A paradox.

name: cagliostro
text:
A most ingenious paradox!

*cough*

name: waldo913
text: "Sprinklered on"

name: androo
text:
My favorite piece of imagery in all of Achewood is the still of Ray squatting like that.

"How come?"

name: rowboat
text: I always love that, too. The only other instance I can immediately recall is this . That's enough in itself, I suppose.

name: jonnay
text: Real businessmen hobble like a motherfucker.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: LIKE A BOSS

name: bluetshirt
text: mumblemumnumblnm
